dialogs.text: What's that over by the river? An ID card? Did someone lose their ID card?

choices.text: Oh, SHOOT! That's mine! I must have dropped it on the way over. I needed to talk to my roommate, but I can't get back into the room without my ID card. I better go get it.

dialogs.text: Oo, I know this! You can access the beach by crossing the bridge. I'm sure that will be no problem.
